document_data.name: Draakhorn
document_data.mainbody: The '''Draakhorn''' was an [[artifact]] that was a gift from [[Tiamat]] to dragonkind during the war between [[dragon]]s and [[giant]]s.
document_data.Powers: The Draakhorn alerted all [[chromatic dragon]]s within {{SI|2000|miles|k|long=yes}}. However, the [[Cult of the Dragon]] corrupted this power in order to call them to the [[Well of Dragon]]s. Additionally, it discomfited all normal [[animal]]s within a few miles when blown.
document_data.History: The Draakhorn was made from a horn of [[Ephelomon]], once a [[red dragon]] consort of Tiamat.
